advancedsearch-options-pane-head: Label for the introduction of advanced search. It is used both as a header for the expanded pane and as a label for the following options when the pane is collapsed.
advancedsearch-optgroup-text: Label for the option group that contains search fields that refer to page content
advancedsearch-optgroup-structure:
Label for the option group that contains search fields that are specialized and/or more structural like templates, subpages and catgeories
{{Identical|Structure}}
advancedsearch-optgroup-files: Label for the option group that contains search fields for file type and properties
advancedsearch-field-plain: Label for the field for plain search
advancedsearch-field-phrase: Label for the field for exact search
advancedsearch-field-or: Label for the field for or search
advancedsearch-field-not: Label for the field for excluded words in search
advancedsearch-field-subpage: Label for the field for searching in subpages
advancedsearch-field-intitle: Label for the field for searching in title
advancedsearch-field-deepcat: Label for the field for searching in category
advancedsearch-field-hastemplate: Label for the field for for searching pages with a template
advancedsearch-field-insource: Label for the field for wikitext search
advancedsearch-field-filetype:
Label for the field for file type
{{Identical|File type}}
advancedsearch-field-filew: Label for the field for file width in pixels
advancedsearch-field-fileh: Label for the field for file height in pixels
advancedsearch-help-plain: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for plain search
advancedsearch-help-phrase: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for exact search
advancedsearch-help-or: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for or search
advancedsearch-help-not: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for excluded words in search
advancedsearch-help-hastemplate: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for searching pages with a template
advancedsearch-help-insource: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for wikitext search
advancedsearch-help-filetype: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file type
advancedsearch-help-filew: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file width in pixels
advancedsearch-help-fileh: Help text shown in a dialog for the field for file height in pixels
advancedsearch-filetype-section-types: Label for the file type section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-image: Label for the image format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-video: Label for the video format section
advancedsearch-filetype-section-document: Label for the document format section
advancedsearch-filetype-bitmap-jpeg: Label for the JPEG file/mime type
advancedSearch-filesize-equals: Label for the file width/height 'equals' comparator selection
advancedSearch-filesize-equals-symbol: Label for the file width/height 'equals' comparator selection as shorthand symbol
advancedSearch-filesize-greater-than: Label for the file width/height 'greater than' comparator selection
advancedSearch-filesize-greater-than-sym: Label for the file width/height 'greater than' comparator selection as shorthand symbol
advancedSearch-filesize-smaller-than: Label for the file width/height 'smaller than' comparator selection
advancedSearch-filesize-smaller-than-sym: Label for the file width/height 'smaller than' comparator selection as shorthand symbol
advancedSearch-namespaces-articles:
Label for the 'Articles' namespace (usually with a an empty translated namespace label)
{{Identical|Article}}
advancedSearch-namespaces-search-in: Label for the 'Search in' section heading of the namespace section
advancedSearch-namespaces-preset-all:
Label for the namespace preset 'All namespaces'
{{Identical|All}}
advancedSearch-beta-feature-message: Label for the AdvancedSearch Beta Feature.
advancedSearch-beta-feature-description: Description for the AdvancedSearch Beta Feature, describing the feature that will be enabled.
